name: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
name_original: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
description:
Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard is an arcade game developed by Phoenix Interactive. It came out on 01-11-2009. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard on PC and PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Emmanuel Prévost and Luc Besson. It was directed by Luc Besson. Éric Serra and Sascha Dikiciyan scored the game.
